titleStmt.title: Several discourses and characters address'd to the ladies of the age wherein the vanities of the modish women are discovered / written at the request of a lady, by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Shannon, Francis Boyle, Viscount, 1623-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Christopher Wilkinson, and are to be sold by Thomas Salusbury ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Viscount Francis Boyle Shannon by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
